Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People are divided over the government's handling of welfare payments as calls for an increase in JobSeeker payments echo across the country. A recent report from the government's welfare committee recommends increasing JobSeeker payments by $375 per week. Meanwhile in a separate news story a major rescue operation was mounted to save 11 stranded fishermen off the coast of Western Australia. The Australian share market continues to suffer from uncertainty due to the recent Reserve Bank interest rate decision with gold mining stocks being touted as a safe haven for investors. Finally COVID-19 testing increases in Sydney's Fairfield with new testing options now available.
